channel.title: Comments on: aligning cells in an html cfgrid
channel.description: Web development notes and commentary from Ryan Stille

item.title: By: Tim
item.dc:creator: Tim
item.description:
Is this the case for CF9? If you need to bind your cfgrid you must use html format. If you use html format - then good luck formating your output to look nice. Sorting doesn&apos;t work and removing the sort buttons (sort="no") doesn&apos;t change anything.
Sometimes I feel you had to be on the CF development team to make any sense of it.
item.content:encoded:
Is this the case for CF9? If you need to bind your cfgrid you must use html format. If you use html format – then good luck formating your output to look nice. Sorting doesn't work and removing the sort buttons (sort="no") doesn't change anything.

Sometimes I feel you had to be on the CF development team to make any sense of it.
